snippet: Daniel Barrera, who was also known as El Loco, was extradited on charges that he manufactured large quantities of cocaine and trafficked it to the United States.
abstract: Daniel Barrera, Colombian kingpin also known as El Loco, is extradited on charges that he manufactured large quantities of cocaine and trafficked it to the United States; he is to be arraigned in federal district courts in Manhattan and Brooklyn, where he faces separate indictments.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Barrera, who was also known as El Loco, was extradited on charges that he manufactured large quantities of cocaine and trafficked it to the United States.

headline.main: Extradited Colombian to Face Charges of Drug Trafficking
headline.print_headline: Extradited Colombian to Face Charges of Drug Trafficking
